attributes.action: Make British companies state clearly on the front of their products the Country of Origin. To impose a tax on British companies who are receiving supplies from countries in which health and safety of workers is not recognised.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Make every retail outlet in England and Wales state (in noticable writing) on the front of every product the country of origin of the product and the countries of origin of any materials used to make the product.

Make every clothing retailer pay a tax for items made both for or on there behalf in countries which do not have decent health and safety at work laws protecting workers in the workplace.
